title: Latency during champion selection
body: During champion selection my game will randomly lag and I unintentionally dodge because I am unable to select my champion or I can't ban a champion. The lag I experience is only in champ select and its getting frustrating because now I'm blocked for 30 mins from que. Is anyone else experience this?

replies.body:
When you enter champion select you begin making connections to the other players so that everyone knows who is picking/banning who. If only champion select is lagging, there's a good chance that your network is having a hard time making those connections. 

Follow our [Connection Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to make sure your network can make stable connections to our servers.

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=EEJRIxQI,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-03-23T21:56:17.318+0000)
>
> When you enter champion select you begin making connections to the other players so that everyone knows who is picking/banning who. If only champion select is lagging, there's a good chance that your network is having a hard time making those connections. 
> 
> Follow our [Connection Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to make sure your network can make stable connections to our servers.



I went ahead and ran the Hextech diagnostic tool, and followed the guidelines in the connection guide including making sure my ports are forwarded and I have a static IP. Everything seems to be set on my end, the issue only comes up after the queue pops and i'm put into champion select I'll get kicked from the lobby with a message "There's been an error with the champion select, you've been put back into queue." at which point I receive the penalty for dodging. This can happen once a night or multiple times a night with no real pattern.

E: I attached a screenshot of what happens when this glitch occurs, [as it happened once again ](http://i.imgur.com/Wds3sDg.jpg)

We definitely don't want you to keep getting dodge penalties when you aren't leaving purposefully! Since it sounds like you're having a very specific issue, let's get you some personal help from our tech guys. 

Reach out to us in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we'll be able to go more in depth there. Until we get this fixed, be sure to test any changes in custom games.
